snippet: The writer of “Tropic Thunder” and “Men in Black 3” imagines a dynamic G.O.P. ticket.
abstract: Screenwriter Etan Cohen imagines a screenplay dialogue between Newt Gingrich and Mitt Romney in which Gingrich is the Republican presidential candidate and Romney is the vice-presidential candidate.
lead_paragraph: The writer of “Tropic Thunder” and “Men in Black 3” imagines a dynamic G.O.P. ticket.

headline.main: How Might Gingrich Coax Romney to Concede?
